question: Question_03_(b)
statement:
Sketch the graph of a continuous function illustrating the Intermediate
Value theorem as stated in part (a). Make sure to include the labels
$a, b, c, f(a), f(b)$ and $L$.
hints:
The labels $a, b, c$ belong on the x-axis, and $f(a), f(b), L$ belong on
the y-axis.
